# Documentation PR

## What changed?

Describe the documentation change (README, screenshots, comments, usage notes).

## Why?

What confusion does this clarify, or what gap does it fill?

## Validation

- [ ] Links checked
- [ ] Screenshots updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No sensitive data included

## Checklist

- [ ] Accurate and consistent with current indicator behavior
- [ ] No phishing links or requests for credentials
